alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 29 at 6:57AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Columbia County, west central Grant, northeastern Webster, eastern Natchitoches, Claiborne, eastern Bienville, southwestern Lincoln and western Winn Parishes through 730 AM CDT... At 657 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Shongaloo to 8 miles south of Gibsland to 8 miles southwest of Montgomery. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homer, Arcadia, Haynesville, Gibsland, Montgomery, Emerson, Shongaloo, Atlanta, Calhoun, Natchez, Clarence, Goldonna, Saline, Lucky, Ashland, Athens, Calvin, Bienville, Lisbon and Bryceland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
